sentences.sContent: I couldn’t afford the rent on my own.
sentences.sCn: 我单靠自己付不起房租。

sentences.sContent: How can she afford to eat out every night?
sentences.sCn: 每天晚上下馆子她怎么能负担得起？

remMethod.val: af + ford(看作Ford， 美国大财阀福特家族) → 财大气粗 → 负担得起

trans.tranOther: to have enough money to buy or pay for something
